description:
Liquid fertilizer perfect for all your garden needs

WonderFert All-Purpose is a liquid fertilizer for plants that’s an easy-to-use, versatile plant food solution for all your gardening needs.

Our all-purpose garden fertilizer is perfect for every garden plant, indoors and out. Its liquid formulation is enriched with potassium and phosphorus along with slow-release nitrogen to ensure increased flowering and leafy growth results that last up to 6 weeks. With WonderFert All-Purpose, expect maximum growth, flowering, and fruiting with minimal effort.

At Sunday, we believe in creating fertilizers without pesticides or harsh chemicals—so you can enjoy your yard and get your hands dirty—not your plants.

sections.product_features:
10-2-6 NPK (Nitrogen-Phosphorus-Potassium) liquid fertilizer for plants
Ideal for vegetable gardens, outdoor plants, and indoor houseplants
Water and fertilize all in one step with gentle garden hose-end sprayer
Multi-use application: hose or watering can
Slow-release nitrogen sustains plant growth for up to 6 weeks
Phosphorus and potassium for increased flowering and fruiting
Safe for use on edible plants
Dual application methods: hose-end sprayer or watering can
Recyclable and resealable rigid container for easy storage
sections.ingredients:
Urea: rapid and leafy plant growth
Urea-triazone: sustained and leafy plant growth
Potassium acetate: promotes flowering and fruiting plant growth
sections.instructions:
Hose Application:
Shake well before use.
Attach to hose and set valve to fertilizer setting.
Apply for 3-4 seconds around the base of plants.
Reapply every 4-6 weeks.
Watering Can Application:
Shake well before use.
Mix with water (1 tablespoon per gallon for outdoor plants; ½ tablespoon per gallon for houseplants).
Apply to the soil base of plants for 3-4 seconds.
sections.optimal_usage_time:
Flowers and perennials: Spring to summer
Trees and shrubs: Spring only
Vegetables: Spring through fall
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
Why choose liquid fertilizer for plants?
Liquid fertilizer formulas, like WondertFert All-Purpose, allow for rapid and sustained uptake of nitrogen, and rapid, visible results of leafy growth, flowering, and fruiting.
How does slow-release fertilizer work?
Slow-release fertilizer refers to slow-release nitrogen. It provides sustained uptake of nitrogen to plants over some time which helps support leafy growth, flowering, and fruiting for longer.
When should I apply all-purpose fertilizer to my garden?
Apply to flowers and perennials from spring to summer, trees and shrubs in spring, vegetables during the growing season, and indoor plants from spring through fall. Avoid fertilizing woody and perennial plants in the fall.
How to use with other Sunday products?
If using other Sunday products, let liquid fertilizers dry completely before applying anything else to your garden. For best results, use our liquid garden fertilizer in combination with Sunday’s dry organic fertilizer, Soil Boost, and weed control. This will help you fertilize plants properly, reduce weeds, and introduce nutrients back to your soil.
